Translations.Text: Rero n’ubandanye ubibutsa	kubera imigisha yUmuremyi wawe, nturi umurozi kandi nturi umusazi
Egome	baravuga	yuko	ari	umwanditsi	w’amajambo	y’ubuhizi	gusa, natwe tumurabira yuko ashikirwa n’urupfu
Vuga uti:- ni murindire nanje ndi kumwe namwe mu bantu barindiriye
Canke	ubwo	bwenge	bwabo	buhanitse	nibwo	bubategeka	ibi	vyose, canke nibo bantu b’amanyama gusa
Canke	nibo	bavuga	yuko	iyi	Qur’ani	ariwe	yayi	yandikiye	kubwiwe, ahubwo nta na kimwe bemera
Rero ni bazane ibiganiro nk’ibi niba bavugisha ukuri
Mbega baremwe ata kintu kiriho, canke nibo biremye
Canke	nibo	baremye	Amajuru	n’Isi?	Ahubwo	ntavyemezo	bafise bw’ikintu na kimwe
Canke barafise ububiko bw’Umuremyi wawe, canke nibo bene gucisha aho bashaka kumategeko yabo
Canke barafise idugiro badugira ko ry’ukumviriza ibivugirwa yo, wewe ubumviriza n’uzane ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro
Canke	irafise	ibibondo	vy’abakobwa,	namwe	murafise	ibibondo vy’abahungu
Canke	urabasaba	impembo	kuri	ivyo	baremerewe	ko	hamwe n’amagarama yayo
Canke iwabo barafise ubumenyi butazwi banditse
Canke bagomba bagire amarorerwa, mugabo abahakanye Imana y’abo y’ukuri nibo bazofatwa
Canke iwabo hariho uwundi Muremyi atari Imana? Imana irisukuye nabo bayigereranya nayo
Naho bari kubona ikintu kivuye k’uruhande rwo mw’Ijuru gikorotse hasi bari kuvuga bati:- ibi n’ibicu bigerekeranye kubindi
Rero n’ubareke kugeza naho bazokorana, n’umusi waho imitima yabo izo sokorwa
N’umusi waho ingeso zabo ataco zizoba marira n’ikintu na gitoyi kandi batazo rokorwa
Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bahemukiye imitima yabo bazoba bafise ibindi bihano, mugabo benshi muribo ntana kimwe bazi
N’urIndire intahe y’Umuremyi wawe, mu vy’ukuri wewe uri imbere y’amaso yacu, kandi n’utakambire Umuremyi wawe gusa kandi uyihayagize mugihe uhagaze uriko urasenga ibisabisho vyose
No hagati mw’ijoro nahone n’uyitakambire n’igihe inyenyeri ziserutse
